LanguageData.MeleeDamageFactor.label: melee damage factor
LanguageData.MeleeDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on the amount of melee damage inflicted by this person.
LanguageData.MeleeDoorDamageFactor.label: melee door damage factor
LanguageData.MeleeDoorDamageFactor.description: A special multiplier on the amount of melee damage inflicted on doors.
LanguageData.RangedCooldownFactor.label: ranged cooldown multiplier
LanguageData.RangedCooldownFactor.description: A multiplier on the cooldown between bursts when using a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyChildFactor.label: age factor
LanguageData.StaggerDurationFactor.label: stagger time multiplier
LanguageData.StaggerDurationFactor.description: A multiplier on the duration of the stagger-slowdown that occurs when damage is taken.
